actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Waxman. Petition No: 109-8.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3925) to provide that a Federal public safety position may not be held by any political appointee who does not meet certain minimum requirements.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (HR 3925) to provide that a Federal public safety position may not be held by any political appointee who does not meet certain minimum requirements.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3925) to provide that a Federal public safety position may not be held by any political appointee who does not meet certain minimum requirements.
